name: Aegis VentFit Tee
description: A moisture-wicking technical tee woven with conductive fibers to track biometric data. Neutral design and tailored fit.

name: Nexus StratoMesh Polo
description: A versatile polo with an RFID-shielded pocket and a slim solar strip along the collar. Understated styling, easy office-to-outdoor transition.

name: Axon CampHaul Duffel
description: A water-resistant duffel from self-healing fabric, hidden solar panel, integrated power bank.

name: Helix Transit Sling
description: A matte black waist pack with encrypted USB storage, low-profile GPS beacon.

name: Synapse Oasis Layer
description: A moisture-regulating long-sleeve with embedded temperature sensors.

name: Kinetic Rush Tights
description: Sleek leggings with conductive filaments gently warming muscles.

name: Vantage Keb Stretch Pants
description: Rugged cargo pants with hidden LED strips and RFID-blocking compartments.

name: Solace Gamma Cargo
description: Utility trousers with discreet solar panels and hidden sleeves for encrypted drives.

name: Astra UltraSpark Flask
description: Insulated flask with UV purification, micro solar cell, app-synced hydration metrics.

name: Aurion HydroZip Reservoir
description: Hydration bladder with volume and temperature sensors, self-sealing membranes.

name: Xenon SolarTech Hoodie
description: Hoodie distributing warmth through conductive threads, powered by a small solar patch.

name: Arclite NanoTherm Vest
description: High-loft vest with passive heating elements, app-driven climate suggestions.

name: Aegis BetaShell Jacket
description: Weatherproof shell with integrated GPS beacon, SOS transmitter.

name: Terra Expedition Parka
description: Heavy-duty parka with biometric sensors adjusting insulation.

name: Solaris Nomad Charger
description: Flexible solar panel mat charging multiple devices, portable and durable.

name: Cipher Solis Hub
description: Palm-sized wireless hotspot with encrypted storage, micro solar cell.

name: Veridian Storm Escape
description: Compact bivy shelter from self-healing fabric, passive solar strips, internal LED lighting.

name: Cryptic SpiritDrive Tool
description: Titanium multi-tool with encrypted storage, mini solar charger, digital compass.
